org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.integration

类 IntegrationAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.integration.IntegrationAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=<error>)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=IntegrationProperties.class)
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=JmxAutoConfiguration.class)
public class IntegrationAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for Spring Integration.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.1.0
